column4: I'd look here http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/wiki/index.php/Main_Page  It appears as if it's been recently gpl'ed
it appears as if the makefile doesn't work in ubuntu--looking for /lib/modules/uname -r/build/, it might require the kernel headers and some such, not sure
I followed bob2's advice about installing kernel headers and the make file compiled succsessfully
not having the card I can't go much further
